data.name: Odyssey VR Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The original soundtrack from Odyssey VR: The Deep Space Expedition.

Tracklist:

  • 01 - Aki Silventoinen - Space VR 02:22
  • 02 - Odyssey VR - Introduction 00:35
  • 03 - Odyssey VR - Mystic Audio 01:03
  • 04 - Odyssey VR - Calm Ambient 00:36
  • 05 - Odyssey VR - Enjoy Your Stay 00:06
  • 06 - Odyssey VR - Find The Tool 00:10
  • 07 - Odyssey VR - Fires 00:05
  • 08 - Odyssey VR - Gravitation 00:23
  • 09 - Odyssey VR - Asteroid Approaching 00:04
  • 10 - Odyssey VR - Life Incubators 00:26
  • 11 - Odyssey VR - Brace For Impact 00:04
  • 12 - Odyssey VR - Quite An Experience 00:02
  • 13 - Odyssey VR - Repair Damage 00:13
  • 14 - Odyssey VR - Oxygen Masks 00:13
  • 15 - Odyssey VR - This Ship Is Home 00:03
  • 16 - Odyssey VR - VR Introduction 00:26
  • 17 - Odyssey VR - Proceed To The Gate 00:08



The Soundtrack will be added to your OdysseyVR folder in the Steam Directory: …Steam\steamapps\common\OdysseyVR\Soundtrack

fullgame.name: Odyssey VR - The Deep Space Expedition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, iOS 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 965M
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Headphones recommended
